resources.string: This app will help you lower your cigarette consumption, even quit smoking, with the help of scientific papers from universities or online researches.\n \nFor you to have better results and the results that the app is giving, you must lower you consumption 50% and maintain it as long as you can.

string.name: Intro_String
string.b: Welcome to Quit Smoking Now app. This app will help you lower your cigarette consumption, even quit smoking, with the help of specific scientific papers.

resources.string: Welcome\nThis is an bachelor\'s thesis app,\n created for University of Peloponnese

This app will help you lower your cigarette consumption, even quit smoking, with the help of scientific papers from universities, researches and researchers papers.\n \nFor you to have better results and the results that the app is giving, you must lower you consumption 50% and maintain it as long as you can.
The links for the papers, are below for you to see:
Did you smoke any cigarettes today?
Did you accidentally click more? Subtract one.
